• Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    82810-3Pregnancy status

name: USCorePregnancyStatusObservationCodes
title: US Core Pregnancy Status Observation Codes
description: The US Core Pregnancy Status Observation Codes Value Set is a 'starter set' of concepts to capture pregnancy status.
